meanings.definition: Something that obstructs or hinders progress.
meanings.sent1: The fallen tree on the path created obstacles for the hikers.
meanings.sent2: The construction site had many obstacles blocking the road.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel placed obstacles in the way by hiding nuts in the trail.
meanings.sent4: Fear can be an invisible obstacle that holds us back from reaching our goals.
meanings.sent5: The thick fog acted as a mysterious obstacle, making it hard to see the way forward.

meanings.definition: A barrier that prevents movement or access.
meanings.sent1: The locked gate was an obstacle to entering the garden.
meanings.sent2: The high wall served as an obstacle for the climbers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel placed obstacles in the way by hiding nuts in the trail.
meanings.sent4: The thick fog acted as a mysterious obstacle, making it hard to see the way forward.
meanings.sent5: The traffic jam was a frustrating obstacle on the way to the airport.

meanings.definition: A difficulty or problem that must be overcome.
meanings.sent1: Lack of experience can be an obstacle in starting a new business.
meanings.sent2: Financial constraints are common obstacles faced by students.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel placed obstacles in the way by hiding nuts in the trail.
meanings.sent4: The thick fog acted as a mysterious obstacle, making it hard to see the way forward.
meanings.sent5: Procrastination can be a major obstacle to achieving success.
